short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to create GoLinks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GO-LINKS is a Chrome extension designed to simplify the management of URLs by creating custom, memorable GoLinks that users can easily recall and type into their browsers. The extension provides a simple and intuitive interface for users to create, manage, and delete GoLinks. It also includes features like a dynamic table that displays saved GoLinks, a search filter for GoLink suggestions in the Chrome Omnibox, and integration with Chromeâ€™s declarative net request API for seamless redirection.

The extension helps users to quickly navigate to their frequently visited websites by creating aliases in the form of "go/some-link," making browsing more efficient. This extension can be especially useful for teams or individuals who frequently visit the same resources, as it provides an easy way to organize and access URLs.
